publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1531 Michael Matheson: Falkirk World Heritage Site Bid-That the Parliament notes the important role that tourism and heritage play in Scotland; recognises that the Antonine Wall is of national and international importance, and congratulates Falkirk Council and Historic Scotland on setting up a steering group to submit a bid to make the Antonine Wall and the many Roman sites throughout Falkirk a world heritage site. Supported by: Linda Fabiani*, Alex Neil*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*

S2M-1531 Michael Matheson: Falkirk World Heritage Site Bid-That the Parliament notes the important role that tourism and heritage play in Scotland; recognises that the Antonine Wall is of national and international importance, and congratulates Falkirk Council and Historic Scotland on setting up a steering group to submit a bid to make the Antonine Wall and the many Roman sites throughout Falkirk a world heritage site. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Alex Neil, Mr Stewart Maxwell
S2M-1531 Falkirk World Heritage Site Bid (lodged on 23 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1531 Falkirk World Heritage Site Bid (lodged on 23 June 2004) Ms Sandra White*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-1531 Falkirk World Heritage Site Bid (lodged on 23 June 2004) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-1531 Falkirk World Heritage Site Bid (lodged on 23 June 2004) Helen Eadie*
